title: Plants that grow from leaves, stems and roots. - Rev. ed.
brief_description: This film contains sophisticated vocabulary with limited explanations. It shows plant growth covering bulbs, corns, tubers, etc. and concentrates on asexual reproduction as required by orchardists and horticulturalist. The contents are comprehensive and the time-lapse photography very good. Suitable for middle and upper secondary levels.
